required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Endovascular treatmenT for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China (DETECT2-China)
clinical_study.official_title: enDovascular trEatmenT for acutE isChemic sTroke in China (DETECT2-China): a Prospective, National, Multi-center, Registry Study

lead_sponsor.agency: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

clinical_study.source: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective real world registry study, aiming to explore the effectiveness and safety of endovascular treatment of acute ischemic stroke in a Chinese population.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
primary_outcome.description: the minimum and maximum values of modified Rankin Score are 0 and 6, respectively; higher score mean a worse outcome

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
secondary_outcome.description: the minimum and maximum values of modified Rankin Score are 0 and 6, respectively; higher score mean a worse outcome
the minimum and maximum values of modified Rankin Score are 0 and 6, respectively; higher score mean a worse outcome

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS)
secondary_outcome.description: the minimum and maximum values of NIHSS are 0 and 24, respectively; higher NIHSS mean a worse outcome
sICH was defined as 4 or more increase in NIHSS caused by hemorrhage

other_outcome.description: neuroimaging included brain CT, MRI or digital subtraction angiography
biomarker included Matrix metalloproteinases, proinflammatory cytokines, and etc.

other_outcome.measure: dynamic changes of TCD data associated
other_outcome.description: transcranial Doppler (TCD) data including blood velocity and pulse index, which will be collected at some centers

other_outcome.measure: dynamic changes of cortical blood oxygen saturation by near infrared spectroscopy
other_outcome.description: The data will be collected at some centers

intervention.description: all enrolled patients must receive endovascular treatment

study_pop.textblock: acute ischemic stroke with large vessel oclussion

facility.name: General Hospital of Northern Theater Command

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region
